article_title: Populist fever: Anger at the democratic deficit

og.description: Populism is a predictable recurring feature of any society that is unwilling or unable to be as democratic as it claims to be.
og.title: Populist fever: Anger at the democratic deficit | The Christian Century

article_metadata.description: The presidential campaign has stirred up primal emotions. Violent rhetoric has provoked violent physical confrontations. We hear much talk of “populist” fury.
